product_name: Terry Bella Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With distinctive style, the Terry Bella Bike Jersey for women offers great comfort and performance for your ride, whether you're doing a wine tour, training for a charity ride or maintaining fitness. Sleek moisture-wicking and quick-drying polyester and spandex fabric offers comfort throughout your ride. Full-length front zipper allows ventilation on the go. 3 back pockets secure your cycling essentials. Raglan sleeves move seams off the shoulders for enhanced comfort and fit. The athletic cut and droptail hem of the Terry Bella Bike Jersey for women ensure a comfortable, flattering fit and full coverage when in the riding position. Closeout.
short_description: With distinctive style, the Terry Bella Bike Jersey for women offers great comfort and performance for your ride, whether you're doing a wine tour, training for a charity ride or maintaining fitness.
